lenders.name: Alex & Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, and it's easy. Alex gave his Mom more money to loan through Kiva as a Christmas present!
lenders.occupational_info: Alex is a college student with interests in international political economics and journalism. His mother Mary Ann is a writer and editor.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the "Teach a man to fish" method of helping.  This is a perfect way to further that philosophy.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide dental services to my patients in a small city in Northwest Indiana, USA.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I admire these people trying to make positive changes in their lives. It's a pleasure to give to those who need. It's even better when they're asking for a hand up, not a hand out.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: Be the change you want the world to be!
lenders.occupational_info: Program Coordinator for Continuing Education at Pima Community College

lenders.name: Ralph and Darlene
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired photographer and my wife works in the retail jewelery business.

lenders.name: Tove
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people I would normally never have a chance to meet.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a nurse, I take care of people who are mentally ill in a large city hospital.

lenders.name: Christi
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small woman owned masonry contractor.

lenders.name: Zohra
lenders.loan_because: There's always someone that needs it more than I do and I want to make a change!

lenders.name: Millionaire Mommy ND
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I achieved financial freedom by operating small businesses of our own. It's my turn to "pay it forward" -- I share the story of my journey from minimum wage to millionaire on my blog. I've pledged my blog's net profits (from advertisers) as no-interest microloans for Kiva entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I feel good helping someone achieve their dream!  It's a win-win situation for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a group of doctors.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help provide opportunities to those individuals seeking what is possible for themselves and who are trying to make a difference in their lives and the lives around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide, information, guidence, direction and support to those people seeking to buy or sell a home.

lenders.name: Lon
lenders.loan_because: it creates a continuum of progress and opportunity.

lenders.name: Eliana
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all deserve a chance at our own success!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in drug development for the pharma and biotech sector.

lenders.name: Earleste
lenders.loan_because:
I am not able to do what I want to, but if I can help someone who has started and this is their livelihood I am all for helping them. 
My dream is to feed the hungry 24/7. So if I help this person maybe it helps my spirit.
lenders.occupational_info: Basically, I pay my company's bills

lenders.name: Marti
lenders.occupational_info: I run a Jewish community center, providing social services in the Bronx, New York City

lenders.name: Diann
lenders.loan_because:
I loan because I can.
And I like the connection with people around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach math from algebra to calculus.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the principle of "Pass It On".  If I can plant a seed, someone else will water it, and God will make it grow!
lenders.occupational_info: I assist lawyers in preparing for trial.

lenders.name: Leanne
lenders.loan_because: I was raised in South America and Iran because of my father's business.  I met amazing wonderful people, whom I still think of today.  I would like to help people around the world provide more for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business owners motivate and train their employees.

lenders.name: Klayton
lenders.loan_because: Person to person is the only way this world will improve.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the travel industry.

lenders.name: Alsia
lenders.loan_because: I like that I can help someone achieve their goal.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the foodservice industry.

lenders.name: Aspenglow Services
lenders.loan_because: the only way we will ever realize real peace in this world is when everyone is given the same opportunities to succeed and prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: Aspenglow Services provides website design and technical support, primarily to independent insurance agencies throughout the United States.

lenders.name: Jeff  & Blandean
lenders.loan_because: IT'S BETTER TO GIVE THAN RECIEVE,   IT FELLS GOOD TO HELP PEOPLE'   give to those who do not have
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big place that makes cakes and sends them to grocery stores to sell  and my husband drives a truck

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: It's fun! Really....I love that I can send a little money to actively help someone and, when they pay me back, I can turn around and do it again and again.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm essentially an administrative assistant for a non-profit organization. I work a lot in Microsoft Office products (Word, Excel, Access) doing reports, maintaining databases, and livening up boring documents with pictures and fun fonts.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Chef in a high volume restaurant.  I also recently started my own business making and selling  Jewellery

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering individuals and because I simply enjoy giving.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can. I am not rich by North American standards but what little I can give helps make a difference in someone else's life in another part of the world where they are not as fortunate. I am grateful for being born Canadian and to have the opportunities I have. Women in other parts of the world aren't so lucky and I want to help them. My Mom raised three kids on her own on a nurses salary and we got by alright but if we were in a poor part of the world I know we would of suffered tremendously. I feel for the many single Mom's and children in the third world countries.
lenders.occupational_info:
Soy una designadora grafica.
I create advertisements, pakckaging, websites and illustrations to help promote and market businesses.

lenders.name: Ilene
lenders.loan_because: I care.  I love the idea of helping people be self-sufficient by being able to sustain a business and earn a living.  It's the whole "give a fish vs. teach to fish" thing. :)  Thanks to Kiva for making it so easy.
lenders.occupational_info: people who want to advertise their products in the magazines I work for buy advertising space from me.

lenders.name: Stefania
lenders.loan_because: It's great to know that with so little I can help someone else to improve his/her life, I feel it is my duty

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: Whenever you help someone else out in their time of need it always comes back 10 fold in blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a center for soldiers in Vicenza Italy.  It's a place where they can come in relax, watch a movie, play video games, read, eat and get away from their daily grind.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: We should all do what we can, no matter how little, and together we can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a law firm preparing legal documents for the purchase, sale and/or mortgage of real estate.

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: because I believe that I can empower someone to better themselves which in turn enriches their families and hopefully, their communities.  Since this is not just a gift, the person receiving the loan has a stake in making the most of their loan and receiving the joy of accomplishment when they pay it back.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people reach their dream of owning their own home.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!
lenders.occupational_info:
My husband is self-employed.
I work as his assistant.

lenders.name: Daryl
lenders.loan_because: I got help to start a business, so I know how important it is, plus entreprenuers are my favourite people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help Clients market their brands

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to give back to the community as well as the world in needs.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Steve and Lisa
lenders.loan_because: We believe that people should be given an opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: We both work in marketing with large multinational companies

lenders.name: Don Gregory
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do, give someone a chance at their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retail manager, I manage 463 people in my facility.

lenders.name: Linda & Karl
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.  Everyone wins.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and have a wonderful life.   Now it is time to give someone a hand.

lenders.name: Janis
lenders.loan_because: I was touched by the story of how/why Kiva.org was created.  I love the idea inparticular of women helping women, being able to reach out across the world to others trying to help themselves & their families.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: Video Production

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I know how difficult it is in developing countries just to get a helping hand so I lend because I know the money is going toward worthwhile projects that help people to become self sustaining.
lenders.occupational_info: Raw food preparation, Feng Shui (Not just the furniture placement) Photography, Natural Sciences, Baking, Recipe Development, Web Design, Print Marketing, Web Video Production, Writing.

lenders.name: Char
lenders.loan_because: There is no greater feeling than helping others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others Feel Good every day!

lenders.name: Frank and Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: we are all of one world ....we can all  'pay it forward'..our greatest gift to humankind is the knowledge that someone really cares and that 'you' whoever/wherever .. are important..welcome to the human race at its best..right here on kiva
lenders.occupational_info: we are retired military , Frank works in the Telecommunications field , I am a Western Artist and take care of our tiny horses.

lenders.name: YOLANDE
lenders.loan_because: it helps others

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: "Charity is not an answer to poverty. It only helps poverty to continue. It creates dependency and takes away individual's initiative to break through the wall of poverty. Unleashing of energy and creativity in each human being is the answer to poverty." Grameen - Banking for the Poor

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I am unbelievably blessed in my life and it just feels natural to help others and pass it on.  And come on, we've all needed a loan at some point in our lives.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus and love helping people.

lenders.name: jessica
lenders.loan_because: everyone should
lenders.occupational_info: i work at an art gallery. i am very lucky.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: It is the least that I can do to help those who have less than I.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide joy and entertainment to the elderly

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I like to give back!
lenders.occupational_info: Financial work - unfulfilling.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: We in America are blessed and I wish to follow the example of Jesus who reached out to those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently volunteering so as to help in any way I can.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit and want to help those who want to help themselves. It makes me feel good.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a wonderful idea to help people who do not have the funds to start up their own business. We take life for granted and this is one small step to say thank you for what we are already blessed with.

lenders.name: Denise Mildred
lenders.loan_because: I feel good about helping to create commerce and affording someone the opportunity to pursue bigger dreams and take better care of their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a married mother of two with a background in Accounting and Finance.  I have a 15 year career which spans auditing, treasury, finance, lending and consulting.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: So many have a definate desire and drive to succeed but maybe do not have the resources available to many of us.  I hope the heartfelt tokens I have offered are beneficial in some small way to helping get someone's life that much closer to sunshine.
lenders.occupational_info: Financially planning or mapping our client's lives in order to help reach their goals of starting a family, a business, saving for an important trip or looking toward retirement.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed in the United States and I respect these people from trying to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I feel especially blessed in my life and wish to "share the wealth."

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I started a business with $200.00 and now have a successful business after 9 years.It was hard work and dedication, but with a little financial help and support anyone can be successful.I believe in you!
lenders.occupational_info: I have a lavender farm. I grow, harvest, dry,and sell lavender. I also make beauty prouducts.I enjoy my job !

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to feel connected to people in other parts of the world.  It is great to see how the money will be used. Mele, I think your jewelry is beautiful and I wish you success.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children with disabilities be happy and independent.  I also love teaching Isshinryu Karate and dancing hula.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: It's the least we can do. We have everything within grasp of us while billions of people just don't have a chance. I almost bought a new pair of shoes today for $30 but decided I'd go back tomorrow to get them. I don't actually NEED them and when I came home there was an email about this and decided that instead of the shoes I don't NEED I'll give to someone who has a greater need than trendy new shoes.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve ridiculously priced food to people who rarely finish it. But it pays for plane tickets to travel the world and visit the less fortunate.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: Giving someone a hand up instead of a hand out can change their life without taking away their pride.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find homes.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to spread Jesus love through giving.  Pay it forward.  We must all take care of one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for my two children ages 14 and 5.  My husband runs a successful marine electrical business.

lenders.name: Kitty
lenders.occupational_info: I work with elementary students that have learning disabilities and other special needs.

lenders.name: Wuanda
lenders.loan_because: I am in a position now where I can be of help to someone. God has blessed me, therefore I feel obligated with pleasure to be a blessing to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: My field of work consist of assisting patients with respiratory diseases. I take care of sick lungs.

lenders.name: April Jones
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so many opportunities in my life. I would love to help someone else in their time of need.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am a mother with two daughters. We have been blessed with the things we need and I want to share with other mothers around the world.  This is a great way to do just that.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: It is the best way to change the world-one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info:
I own my own business and work out of my house. My business is with health products.

I am a retired school teacher.

lenders.name: Mary-Beth
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: filmmaker

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels to struggle with finding the financial needs to turn your dreams and talents into a successful business. If Americans find this difficult, I can only imagine the difficulty people in third world countries have.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.occupation: PR/Marketing, amongst so many other things!
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help in some small or maybe huge way.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneurial.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I'm selfish -- I like feeling good by helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the in the Department of Pediatrics in a medical school.  I assist in providing medical services and research efforts for children as well as teaching future physicians/health staff.

lenders.name: alicia
lenders.loan_because: I believe helping people achieve their goals is a great gift.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe very strongly in giving people a hand up instead of a hand out.  I have been blessed in my live and  know I can help make a difference by sharing with others.   Together we can make a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at the college level to future teachers.  I am also a substitute teacher in our local school district.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others in need.  It's a big part of who I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I research CRM softwares, customize them and train people how to use them.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help others to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a small business owner.  I make, gift package and deliver cookies to people in my area.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to help someone to  have a brighter future.  I hope this will help even one person/family
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a home day care. It's great having an imput in a small childs life.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: It feels so good to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Wm. Scott
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes.

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I was a single mother so I recognize the extra challenges that presents.  I also realize how far a little assistance can go towards getting past those hurdles that life throws in one's way.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been retired since late 2005 but was employed as an assistant to a federal Member of Parliament for most of my working life.

lenders.name: Finley Family
lenders.loan_because: we have been blessed as a family, We decided rather than giving friends and family gifts they do not need, this is a way for many people to be Blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a Pressure Cleaning company.  We live in Florida where mold & fungus grows.  Our company cleans homes & businesses in need of this service.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a hand up, not a hand out.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a degree in elementary education but I am currently a stay at home mom.

lenders.name: Griselda
lenders.loan_because: We're all blessed in different ways and should forward those wonders to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company manage projects and external associates.

lenders.name: Cyndi
lenders.loan_because: I've received help when I've need it, and now that I am in a better place financially, I loan because I can.  I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 8th grade English.  Most of my students are 13 years old.  I love teaching!

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: what a fantastic and creative way to make a difference.  This isn't a hand out it is a hand up!
lenders.occupational_info: Oil and Gas Project Accountant - I clean up MESS!!

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life and wanted to give back to make a difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: " I have everything, yet have nothing; and although I possess nothing, still of nothing am I in want "

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others that aren't as fortunate as we are.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell computer software to companies so they can run they business more efficiently.

lenders.name: Laila
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone less fortunate than me. And because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who need physical help. I cook, clean, shop, take them to appointments.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to improve their lives.  I have been lucky enough to receive help when I needed it.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught for 33 years in elementary school and loved my job.  Now I am retired and volunteer for senior citizens group and a group, AAUW, to help educate women.

lenders.name: Maria Cristina
lenders.loan_because: It is in the giving that we receive...

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone else and everyone deserves a chance to take care of themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large California State Department and I'm a analyst working with the veteran community.

lenders.name: Elmer
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: I like to pay it forward

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want make a difference....small actions can add up!  I grew up on a farm and target my giving towards developing farms.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: Enabling other parents to build a better life for their children enables me to be a better parent.

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because:
"For whom much is given, much is expected" 
I have been blessed !
lenders.occupational_info: education and social services to help  children and families.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: A few friends loaned me money to start my business when I was struggling financially as a single mother. It turned my life around. I want to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Sherron
lenders.loan_because:
We are so blessed here in America that it should be in us all to want to give to those that are in need.

"...When someone has been given much, much will be required in return; and when someone has been entrusted with much, even more will be required. Luke 12:48"
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to help manage the projects and clients that our company is working on

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It's a privilege to have this opportunity to lend a hand to someone who clearly deserves it.  Thank you Kiva for giving me this chance to share my resources.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of horses.  I clean their stalls, feed & water them, mow their fields & generally take care of their day to day needs.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Love is all there is !
lenders.occupational_info: Sales.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: Heard about this on Oprah!!  Just a small way to give back for the blessings in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell fragrance and flavor ingredients to Personal Care companies in the United States

lenders.name: Ann Marie
lenders.loan_because: I love to help other that are less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: Customer Service

lenders.name: victoria
lenders.loan_because: I believe in possibilities, a new earth of peace and prosperity for all who wish to participate.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start your own business.  I would love to make a difference in someone else life!
lenders.occupational_info: I help families find their dream home.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: Because it gives the Glory to God.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm responsilbe for implementing quality systems and improvments.

lenders.name: Zenta
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an office manager and owner of a restaurant. 
I believe that if you work hard and believe you can achieve anything.

lenders.name: Constance L
lenders.loan_because: I need to feel small so I give to those who have less then I

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little bit of help every once in a while. Someday it may be me.
lenders.occupational_info: sounds a little boring and not fun,but it is nice to be able to stay home with my girls in their first few years.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I have been focused to much on myself and what I don't have. When in reality I am truly blessed. I need to focus more on trying to help others and being thankful for what God has blessed me with.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a structural engineer, wife, and mother of one.  My work involves desiging bridges and retaining walls for the highways and city streets.

lenders.name: JASON
lenders.loan_because: I loan because my life is full of good things - family, work, and enough money to get by.  My family struggled when I was younger and helping others help themselves feels like the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Joseph Flores
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others when im able to do so. Especially those hard working folks who just need a little help and encouragement . . .
lenders.occupational_info: I play music for small and large crowds of people and get to watch them dance and enjoy themselves...

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I think It is important to help people become autonomous.
lenders.occupational_info: I have varied backgrounds and lots of education. Currently I'm involved with construction and education.

lenders.name: Edie
lenders.loan_because: It is my great pleasure!!!

lenders.name: Marti Snyder
lenders.loan_because: I find such joy in the faces of the poeple seeking these loans, helping to fulfill their dream is a blessing.
lenders.occupational_info: I do volunteer work and am building my home based business with Fortune Hi-Tech Marketing

lenders.name: MSC Learning by Loaning
lenders.loan_because:
Why do we loan?
 Someone may ask why a group of kids like us are giving money to people who are in third world countries.  If you really think about it we are in the same boat.  We are in trouble and have problems yet we are trying to change our lives.  Everyday someone on Kiva is trying to change their life.  I believe in order to move forward in life you have to change.  This is just what these people are trying to do.  We give loans not only to learn or to be a better person, but also to give ourselves and others a second chance.  So why not give a loan?

  by J.M. age 17
  resident, Maurice Spear Campus
lenders.occupational_info: We are  Maurice Spear Campus, a small school for at risk youth, operated by the Lenawee Intermediate School District in Adrian, Michigan.   Our school is using KIVA as a vehicle to learn geography,current events and philanthropy.  Our students raise money,  manage funds and write proposals for potential loan candidates.  They then learn about the countries, cultures, and political situations of their loan recipients

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: This is an excellent way to help others, turning a small amount from many into a lot of good.  It's good to help an organization which sends all the donations to the end user.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the budget and accounting department at my institution

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together

lenders.name: Josue
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of computers.

lenders.name: Desiree
lenders.loan_because: I would like in some way to be part of the process of eliminating proverty in the world.

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women start and maintain a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach science to children and I teach teachers how to teach science.

lenders.name: Meagan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, in any way possible, enpower women to become great at whatever task. Anyone can give $25 and there could not be a better feeling then helping someone else make a living and a difference--even on the other side of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help educate my community about our local Habitat for Humanity, who works to build affordable housing for low-income families.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate to be able to and it's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the more grateful we are for what we have to share, the more we will be aware of everything rich in our lives. Although I am very grateful for the creature comforts I have, my family and friends fill my heart.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an accounting firm. I am responsible for not only working with people on their taxes, but in making them aware of what they are spending and taking in all year long. I work mostly with corporations.

lenders.name: Dale
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's the right thing to do. I would like to believe someone would be there to help me if I were in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school counselor, serving the needs of teenagers everyday. I work to promote their education as well as their personal growth and development.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I believe small businesses are better helped by small personal loans as opposed to large corporate donations.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Set Designer in the Movie Business

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: Life is too short to be selfish.  Every little bit that can make a difference and ease someone's struggles is worth it.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference rather that just talking about it.
lenders.occupational_info: I love working with animals and want to help them have an enjoyable and healthy experience getting haircuts and baths.  i also volunteer at the humane society grooming rescue dogs.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I care enough to help others who are working hard, struggling to get ahead and provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and still find joy in helping others.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I live in Quito, though I am a North American.  Seeing so much poverty first hand in Ecuador, I wanted to do a small part to help someone who is making a go!
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home with our son and daughter.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.occupational_info: Musician and teacher

lenders.name: Charmayne & Charles
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to do more, but never felt that I had the money or means to do so.  When you're not as wealthy as Bill Gates or Oprah,  I felt that I wasn't really making a contributuion.  But after seeing this website, I know that I can make a contribution and impact lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Esthetician.  I promote skin care health.  I'm licensed in waxing,(hair removal) and make up application.  I love to make people look and feel good.  Charles is an officer in the US Army, he is stationed at the Pentagon

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: this life is a long-term game.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies with a lot of money make a lot more money.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: This is a way to actually make an impact without being rich.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but my passions are living a Christian life, Grandkids and Motorcycles.

lenders.name: Bev
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Artist who works with mixed metals and glass to create  my own line of jewelry.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I want to get involved in areas of the world that need a little extra help.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: It feels good. It does good. It is good.
lenders.occupational_info: Teach sustainable construction practices to university students in the states & offer time & service to the Eden Campus, Africa's first green business school (www.EdenCampus.co.za),

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good to invest in someone's future.

lenders.name: Olalekan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are less privileged than me. I am amazed than the little I can give can impact someone's life so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a government organization where I help people solve computer related problems in order that they can do their work successfully.

lenders.name: elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: make great strides... leave small footprints
lenders.occupational_info: i buy construction services.

lenders.name: Barbara&Adam
lenders.loan_because: we want to help people around the world!

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I could not have made it through this life without the kindness and generosity of others.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I have been in the craft business for almost 30 years.  It's given me the opportunity to be a work-at-home mom.  Helping someone who 'loves' fabrics and textiles as much as I do is very heartwarming.  I learned about KIVA on Oprah and thought it was a very worthwhile organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 'professional crafter'.  I began doing craft shows selling hand made baby decor and moved onto country home accessories about 20 years ago.  I opened my first website about 5 years ago.

lenders.name: Edie
lenders.loan_because: I am so blessed to have a wonderful  and virtually carefree life, perhaps because I definitely know that only through some form of service and giving is true happiness on this planet possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer in prison, sharing that when we begin to know who we truly are, do we feel any kind of fulfillment.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good inside.:)

lenders.name: Summer and Rob Belloni
lenders.loan_because: we are fortunate enough to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info:
Summer - Teacher
Rob - IT Analyst

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I love to help fellow entrepreneurs get their businesses off the ground. And to give people a hand when they need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people attain wellness, reach their goals and maintain good health with good habits and nutritional supplements.

lenders.name: Gwendolyn
lenders.occupation: Manager for Respiratory Services and Educator of Future Respiratory Therapist
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so many opportunities by simply being born in this country and I would like to support the efforts of others who would like to advance their station in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage Respiratory Therapist's for a major healthcare organization. It is rewarding work. In addition I am an adjunct professor providing clinical over site for future respiratory therapist.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I believe Kiva is providing an amazing opportunity and moreover a right for men and women around the world to take control of both their lives and the well being of their families.  Despite political and economic strife in many of the participating Kiva countries, goals can be achieved and dreams  realized with the help of this program. People like myself can help those who also want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the wine industry in Canada. The company both owns and acts as agents for wineries around the world. My contribution involves taking these wines to market and selling them to restaurant chains across the country. This is one reason I am interested in loaning in the agriculture and farming sectors as well as retail. In our industry the land and grape growers are an integral part in the success and growth of our company. I believe that sustainable farming practices can have a multitude of benefits in developing areas. I am so thrilled to play a small part in this brilliant program.

lenders.name: annie
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel great!
lenders.occupational_info: to be retired does not mean to do nothing. I just don't get paid now! My time is spent primarily on family and friends.

lenders.name: Tarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my success with others who work hard and may not have the same opportunities that I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an oil and gas company that drills wells for natural gas.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those who want to help themselves.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I think we are all connected in this world.  I want to help someone make a better life for their children.

lenders.name: Burt
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to know that i have the power to improve people's lives.

lenders.name: Oma
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel warm and fuzzy
lenders.occupational_info: I am semi-retired from the legal profession.  I spend most of my time in my herb and vegetable garden.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We all need to do our part and set a good example for our children.

lenders.name: Tanya
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy way to help people all over the world.

lenders.name: Chi-Chi
lenders.occupational_info: I perform and teach classical music.

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because: I don't have a single entrepreneur bone in my body. I admire people that under hardship  carve an existence for themselves however and I hate to see  potential wasted due to lack of support and political ineptitude and apathy.
lenders.occupational_info: No tengo un gran sentido empresarial pero admiro a la gente que trabaja en situaciones dificiles y odio el gasto de energia  generado por la falta de apoyo y la apatia politica o la corrupcion.

lenders.name: Minh Thien
lenders.loan_because: i need some money for invest in the babe shop
lenders.occupational_info: i am a worker . i earn about 5usd/day . so i need some money to invest in the babe shop to increase my income.

lenders.name: Stephen and Dixie
lenders.loan_because: We can and it makes us feel good helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I want to share with those less fortunate than myself
lenders.occupational_info: I built a software company and sold it to Cisco, now I work on emerging technology there.

lenders.name: Jayne
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteering at a charity thrift shop is the best non-paid job a person can have.  It fills your heart.

lenders.name: sheila
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP OTHERS IN DIFFERENT PARTS  OF THE WORLD, WE ARE SUCH A FORTUNATE COUNTRY WE SHOULD ALL DO WHAT WE CAN DO TO HELP OTHERS IN THE WORLD. I  SAW KIVA ON OPRAH-THANK YOU OPRAH FOR SHOWING ME A WAY TO GIVE!!!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I OWN MY OWN SWIMMING POOL CLEANING, MAINTENCE, SERVICE.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I had help opening my small business...passing on the favor.

lenders.name: James
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a retired diesel mechanic, working mostly on everything from
aerial boom trucks to diesel cars

lenders.name: Mayra
lenders.loan_because: Nothing makes sense in this life if we can't help each other and share the blessings we've been given.  It feels great to help someone else!

lenders.name: inevitable.cc
lenders.loan_because: I want others to be able to do well for themselves.

lenders.name: Lor
lenders.loan_because:
Why Not!

We are all one under the planetary umbrella, each of us a part of the whole.

lenders.name: Eric & Staci
lenders.loan_because: we are small business owners ourselves and we know how important it is to have others believe in your dream.
lenders.occupational_info: Staci teaches English as a second language to immigrants of all language backgrounds.  She also writes ESL textbooks. Eric owns and runs  Irish pubs.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: it helps me to appreciate what I have and be grateful that I live where I do.

lenders.name: Rhonda
lenders.loan_because: what a wonderful opportunity to be able to help others, see the results immediately and directly!  This is the neatest thing!

lenders.name: Fiona,Isak,Rosa,Kath&Ole
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in this world.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I have benefitted greatly from people who have provided me with opportunities I otherwise would not have had.  I am honored to do the same for others.

lenders.name: David and Katie
lenders.loan_because: we believe that everyone should be able to follow their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: David writes software for a company that is turning textbooks into an online format to save students money and cut down on costs. He also started and owns and operates a company that makes websites for start-up businesses, non-profit organizations and churches. Katie is in marketing communications for a large company.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I've been so lucky...it's my responsibility to help others!

lenders.name: Paige
lenders.loan_because: I want to support growth for small business owners around the world
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small sandwich, bakery and catering company in the heart of thoroughbred horse country.

lenders.name: Dave & Kathy
lenders.loan_because: We've been very fortunate and all our children and grandchildren are healthy and doing well.  We're very thankful!
lenders.occupational_info: He spent many years as a plumbing contractor.  She divided her time between public health nursing and chasing 4 children around.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make someone's dream a reality.

lenders.name: Janet & Ron
lenders.loan_because:
We loan because we feel we have been blessed by God and everyone deserves a chance to make an honest living to provide for themselves or their family. 
We also like knowing where our money is going and who we are helping.

lenders.name: Merry
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of giving a hand up.  I also like seeing the people the money helps.

lenders.name: MICHAEL
lenders.loan_because: Everyone has a choice we can watch or we can help. I choose to help because I want to see people who we help make a difference so they can make a difference themselves. All it takes is a little of ourselves to make things happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with lenders to help people purchase and refinance homes and commercial properties

lenders.name: Harold
lenders.loan_because: If we all helped a little it would make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on highways and roads.

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.loan_because: I can ... Can you?

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I prefer to invest in those things that will make the change in the world I would want to make.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by these people. It makes me want to go out and start my own business to help others with small businesses in my own neighborhood.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserve help. It feels good to do something for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: My work I thought was difficult at times, until I see how hard and dedicated these people are to work to make a living.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: This is just a small way to give back for all the blessings in my life. There is nothing more gratifying than to lend a helping hand to someone who needs it.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea.  I like the idea of helping someone so directly.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a law enforcement officer for 27 years, I worked in the courts.

lenders.name: Desroches Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to help small business owners across the world achieve success !!!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family that travels a lot, and see poverty in many countries.  This is a great way to help, not only monetarily but also by giving people assistance while maintaining their pride !

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: God calls us to help those who need help. I believe Kiva gives honest and hard working people a chance to better their family's future by leveraging the monies of the world for the betterment of society as a whole.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a father of 2 who loves his life as much as he loves his wife.

lenders.name: Abby
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great idea.  It isn't a hand out, but a hand up.  I'm proud to be involved in these businesses.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: Someone once helped me start a business that supported my family for a number of years.
lenders.occupational_info: I have raised 4 wonderful children and now take care of my home and my husband. I just found out that I am going to be a grandmother!!

lenders.name: Rachelle
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have been born a female in this country and have been given limitless opportunities to succeed.  I feel these loans are an excellent way to help improve the lives of those less fortunate and their future generations.

lenders.name: Kimberly Castillon
lenders.loan_because: We appreciate the hard work and dedication that these people have in order to care for their families. Sometimes we ALL just need a little boost.

lenders.name: mardi
lenders.loan_because:
If I can stop one heart from breaking,
I shall not live in vain;
If I can ease one life the aching,
Or cool one pain,
Or help one fainting robin
Unto his nest again,
I shall not live in vain.

  _______Emily Dickinson

lenders.name: Isabelle
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in California, studying Political science with an emphasis in public administration. Someday I would like to work for the UN or another NGO that helps others around the world.

lenders.name: Sandra Mullings Barrett
lenders.loan_because: "Give to him who asks you, and from him who wants to borrow from you do not turn away" (Matthew 5:42). We all have a responsibility to give to those less fortunate than ourselves.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children who are between the ages of 10 to 14 years of age and have special needs.  Also, have been a missionary in Kenya.

lenders.name: Anderson Custom Homes
lenders.loan_because: We believe in giving back to the community.  Kiva is one of the best  websites around to do this!  As business owners, we definately understand the hardships of starting up and we want to help in our own small wayl
lenders.occupational_info: We own a small, family owned construction business specializing in mountain contemporary and cedar log homes.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than I am.
lenders.occupational_info: Generous, compassionate, wanting to help in any way possible.

lenders.name: RYAN
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur and feel blessed to have the life that I do.  I would like to help other people's dreams come true.

lenders.name: Veronica Vallez
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans are a great way to help people around the world and it's an easy way to put my beliefs into action.
lenders.occupational_info: Tech Recruiter

lenders.name: Hector and Barrie
lenders.loan_because: Is better to give than to receive

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I can and because I believe that microfinancing can have a huge impact on the lives of people and communities. I invest here in Canada and want to use some of my own wealth to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer, imagineer and facilitator. I help governments, companies and non profits realize their potential as sponsors of innovative enterprises.

lenders.name: Rosalie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because giving is one of the biggest things that makes me feel the happiest.
lenders.occupational_info:
I became a nurse because I wanted to make a difference in the world by helping the sick.  
What I didn’t expect is that I would receive so much more in return.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed and I am called to bless others

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to lend a hand to those who are actively trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: It's very rewarding to be able to give of myself either physically or financially.

lenders.name: Mary Ellen Barton
lenders.loan_because: IN MEMORY OF MY DEAR ANYA MEGAHAN - I LOVE AND MISS YOU, PUMPKIN!!!  I HOPE TO SEE YOU AGAIN SOMEDAY...YOU'LL ALWAYS BE MY GIRL.       LOVE, YOUR ELLEN
lenders.occupational_info: I write policy directives for the United States Navy.

lenders.name: Tonja
lenders.loan_because: I do for others what I would want done for me.      "Do not wait for leaders. Do it alone, person to person." - Mother Teresa.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 15/16 year-olds how to read and write.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I respect the people of Peru and enjoyed my visit to several countries in Africa.  I hope I can make a small difference in our world.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: I am withdrawing my funds from Kiva ... and making future loans through other organizations because Kiva continues to promote cockfighting businesses by posting cockfighting loans on the Kiva website. ..... For over a year Kiva has been requested by many, many Kiva lenders to please add bloodsports to the list of businesses for which Kiva will not post loans, but kiva management adamantly refuses. Therefore I am withdrawing my funds and am supporting other more humane organizations

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I makes me feel good to help people!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can.  And it feels sooo good to give.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who need it. I can't afford to loan large amounts by myself and love being able to combine with others to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and editor who loves to use information to educate, inform and entertain.

lenders.name: Iren
lenders.loan_because: There were difficult times in my life when I needed help and I was blessed to receive it.     Now it's my turn to return the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a chef who specializes in raw fish.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others the chance to succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure computers are secure

lenders.name: Leonard
lenders.loan_because: I just feel that it is encumbent upon us all to make the world a better place, in whatever way we can. The good feeling one gets from helping others is undeniable.
lenders.occupational_info: I am reponsible for the installation of air conditioning and heating systems in commercial buildings

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I think that it's important to support someone that wants to try something on their own and support their family, be given a hand up. I would want someone to do the same for me if I needed it!
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an international trade law firm. I consult companies on import laws and do a lot of training on U.S. import laws.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of the human race.
lenders.occupational_info:
I go to school for half of the day to become a teacher. 
The rest of the day I work with 5th and 6th graders at a literacy program.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: If I can't open my own business, I want to be able to help someone else succeed with theirs!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a legal secretary in New York City in labor and employment law.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I have access to funds, while many other entrepreneurs don't.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and give something back.

lenders.name: jan
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO HELP A WOMAN HAVE HER DREAM COME TRUE.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: Lift a finger, lift the world, one person at a time....

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.occupational_info:
I work no more that 8 days per month, providing extra income for my family.  I dedicate the majority of my time to caring for my 2 children and husband.  I try to be a good citizen and help others when I can.
I consider this an amazing opportunity to lend support to small business owners around the world.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I have beenin business for over 35 years, there is a certain pride in owning and succeding in business, I think it is wonderful that we can give others this opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work with schools and non profit  groups. youth groups, etc.

"Helping groups reach their goals"

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: It is wonderful to be able to give someone a chance to pursue their passion and better the life of their family.

lenders.name: Ray
lenders.occupation: Software Sales Consultant, Human Rights Activist
lenders.loan_because: I believe poverty is one of the most important issues of our time and this is a great idea to lift people out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info:
I specialize in enterprise software, which is software used by large businesses and organizations to do their day to day operations.

I also help organize an anti-human-trafficking community group in Washington DC.  For more info about the group, go to www.stopmodernslavery.org.

lenders.name: Coeur
lenders.loan_because: It matters to them, it matters to me! We are all one heart united.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Children's book author that inspire children into positive action by encouraging them to be Angels in Action for others.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Because, overall, it makes the world a smaller, better place to live.

lenders.name: Elesa
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to learn about the world and be a participant in change that works.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. We can really only help the people who want to help themselves. I am happy to see people who are trying to better their situation and am more than happy to lend a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people save money & make money to plan for their future. Goal setting is key, most people don't plan to fail, they just fail to plan. I help people get to where they want to be.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe most people will succeed, if we can find a way to give them a chance.

lenders.name: Linda Sanders
lenders.loan_because: I can and I believe that this is the way to change the world, one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I did many things before retiring; I was a probation officer, a social worker, a loan officer and owned a restaurant.

lenders.name: Deborah & Leigh
lenders.loan_because: We want our grandchildren Anthony, Nico, Seaonna, Emma, Sonja, Vincent and Lily to live in a world that helps people up and have hope.

lenders.name: Jewel
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to give back and helps all of us on this planet.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a leadership and life coach helping women to set and achieve their goals. I help people and organizations to develop their potential.

lenders.name: ANNA
lenders.loan_because: I loan because maybe one day I will need help and somebody will find me and help me. Another reason is that I want to fight poverty and maybe this little thing bring a smile to  a person in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a housekeeper.I don't make a big money ,but I feel that there are always people who have less than I do  who struggle every single day to survive .

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: This world needs to give "Mercy" and to recieve. I am able to do both here. Do the right thing....Pay it forward....There but for the Grace of God go I....
lenders.occupational_info: Grandmother, Mom & Wife...Part time Yoga Inspiration to others and random acts of kindness woman.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I believe one person can make a difference and that 'what goes around, comes around' is true.  This organization allows the average person, with average resources, to make an impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student, a mother and also work part time in social service field.  I donate to Kiva in honor of all the kids in my family! Especially my nephew Joshua, who I am holding in the photo.

lenders.name: Erna Pierre
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed all my life. This is my way to make a little difference in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Not my dream job but I have a good salary that allows me to do what I need to do.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: as a small business person myself, I know how much time and dedication it takes to run a sucessful business. Also, it makes me feel great!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time freelance photographer. I make most of my income from weddings, portraiture, and commercial work such as photographing boquets and cakes(yum!) for wedding magazines. I also photograph the restaurants that are reviewed for my local newspaper.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: I believe that when each of us succeeds, we all are blessed.

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: Girls are uneducated and women are marginalized in large parts of this world, and it’s not an accident that these countries are disproportionately mired in poverty and ripped apart by fundamentalism and chaos. There’s a growing recognition among everyone from the World Bank to the U.S. military’s Joint Chiefs of Staff to Aid Organizations that focusing on women and girls is the most effective way to fight global poverty and extremism. Foreign aid is increasingly directed to women because the world is awakening to a powerful truth: Women and girls are the solution!

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable hard-working people to better their living conditions,  letting them know others care about their plight.

lenders.name: Anastasia
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help people directly.  I have a small business and know what a struggle it can sometimes be.
lenders.occupational_info:
I like to sew.  My specialty is historic clothing, but I make all kinds.  I work as a volunteer to local theatre groups and sew for my children, grandchildren and friends.

Alas, Anastasia passed away on 7 July 2014. I will continue her Kiva account, along the lines she set, in her memory.

(Brian)

lenders.name: melissa
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone in need.  I am so glad that I am fortunate enough to be able to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I program computer software to support a manufacturing business

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to give.  It is a win win

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: It is time to give new starts to people
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteer @ Cuyahoga Valley Art Center

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired , and a homemaker.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Because I want to help someone in need.

lenders.name: Vicki and Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to show thanks for the opportunities I have been given because people trusted me.  I took $100 from my first student loan to loan to someone else for the next year.  I am so glad I found a way to help that doesn't have a religious or political backing.  Go team Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I am 44 years old and just got my undergraduate degree and begun my own business.  It is never too late to get an education and change your life.  That first $100 for Kiva has been recycled over and over, much to my delight - one of the best investments I've ever made.

lenders.name: Rhea Lynn & Ryder
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Janine
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate that I have the life that I do. I would like to try to help others in countries where the opportunites are few and far between.

lenders.name: Emmy
lenders.loan_because: I really want to "help those who help themselves" and this seems to be a beautiful way to accomplish that.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired mother of four and now realizing a new career as someone who takes care of nature's little plants at home and protects the lives of swimmers at a local pool. I just got my Red Cross lifeguard certificate this year!

lenders.name: Darrell & Kris
lenders.loan_because: We lead a blessed life and want to provide others with the same opportunity to achieve their aspirations and dreams.

lenders.name: thomas& maggie
lenders.loan_because: Its chance to make a differance form home
lenders.occupational_info:
Operate a people mover
 Wife helps people in need

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I care about people getting a fresh start and a chance to better their lives.

lenders.name: J. S. V.
lenders.loan_because: Such a small sacrifice on my part can have a huge impact on the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: pastor at a small parish in the mountains of West Virginia

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: you can't get along in life without a little help.
lenders.occupational_info: lucky

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: Blessings given are blessing received. Love thy neighbor.
lenders.occupational_info: I do not work at this time due to health limitations.

lenders.name: Calvin Correli
lenders.occupation: Founder of Simplero, spiritual teacher to entrepreneurs
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people grow into their own.

lenders.name: Caitlin
lenders.loan_because: these people work harder than most people and i can help them reach economic independence.
lenders.occupational_info: read, write, think, research (not necessarily in that order)

lenders.name: Wellness4theworld
lenders.loan_because: I believe in supporting the greater good, I believe that we need to support our community at a soul level, I believe that the more we give, the more we heal ourselves and the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I practice healing arts with women in children around the world. I practice in North America and Southeast Asia (mainly Thailand) my husband and I are in the process of building an eco-healing center/birthing center in Northern Thailand.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed in so many ways that I feel it's my responsibility to give back.

lenders.name: Betty & Jim
lenders.loan_because: To give a little help to our friends in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: That we may serve.

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.loan_because: I like to make a difference

lenders.name: Ron & Karla
lenders.loan_because: As entrepreneurs ourselves, we know the challenges of starting your own business and then making it grow.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell products and goods wholesale.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: It is a gift in itself to give to someone in need.  My hopes and dreams are that by my small contributions I am able to positively affect another person's life thus triggering good throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I review and document business processes looking for opportunities for optimization and automation (less steps = less time = less financial output = more money saved or earned)

lenders.name: Angel
lenders.loan_because: Passing it on ....

lenders.name: Irene & Mark
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help from time to time, if we can help someone achieve their dream it's payback for all the times someone has helped us through life.
lenders.occupational_info: Irene works for a health care company and Mark is a fabricator at Glacier Bay in Union City.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for all of the support that I have received myself and want to show my gratitude by passing it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I create and ship custom embroidered baby gifts all around the World.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I admire those who strive to lift themselves up and work independently.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
I can't do much, but I can make it a little easier for someone else.
It is even more important to me now because I have been laid off from my great paying job, and live in a place with 13% unemployment, the future looks tough for me, but not as difficult as the people who KIVA loans help.
lenders.occupational_info: It only takes a minute, a small step, to do SOMETHING.  This is not a hand out, this is a helping hand.

lenders.name: Khalil and Fatim
lenders.loan_because: My wife and I would like to make an effort to bring positive change in people’s life whenever possible.

lenders.name: Hallie
lenders.loan_because: I feel that I am very fortunate in my life and this little bit that I can do to help is good.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean in a church 3 times a week and help an elderly women one day a week.  It helps supplement the family income and allows me to see my kids off to school and be home when they get home from school.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves to be successful in their work.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach ballet and Hawaiian hula dance and my husband and I rebuild old homes in Oklahoma City Oklahoma.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help those who want to help themselves and their families. How can you not?
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Dialysis Laboratory that tests the blood of over 100,000 patients with Kidney Disease. I work every day so that others can have a better tomorrow.

lenders.name: elda
lenders.loan_because: Its good to share.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involve alot of studying and i`m doing what i got to do.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by a recent Oprah Winfrey Show.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a full-time student at Emmaus High School.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the women of the world.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help. I found kiva through a friend of mine and was convinced by the idea of kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a lawyer in Düsseldorf, Germany. I'm employed at a big company. Most of the time I care for the legal cases of the company, provide legal advice to the board of directors, the emploees and external partners.
